projects.title: Agentic AI Candidate Career Platform
projects.description: Multi-agent system built with crewAI to automate resume tailoring and interview preparation. Analyzes job postings, profiles candidates, and generates targeted interview materials.

projects.title: Piezoelectrics AI Discovery Lab
projects.description: AI-assisted discovery of lead-free piezoelectric materials using ensemble ML models. Achieved 69% RÂ² score using Random Forest and XGBoost.

projects.title: Professional Networking Platform
projects.description: Distributed microservices platform supporting 10,000+ concurrent users. 6+ Java Spring Boot microservices with Kafka event streaming, deployed on Docker & Kubernetes.

projects.title: Ride-Booking Engine
projects.description: Production-grade ride-booking backend with real-time matching, wallet payments, and geospatial features. Uses PostGIS for location services.

projects.title: Flight Difficulty Scoring Model
projects.description: Data-driven operational framework quantifying flight complexity from multi-source operational data. Engineered 30+ features across ground time, baggage, passenger dynamics.

projects.title: Consumer Behavior Analysis
projects.description: Big data analysis of Amazon customer reviews using PySpark for ETL. Applied K-Means clustering for customer segmentation and Apriori algorithm.

projects.title: Web Scraping & Data Collection
projects.description: Industrial-scale web scraping project extracting 10,000+ company reviews from AmbitionBox. Implemented robust error handling, rate limiting, and data validation.

projects.title: Spring AI Chat Bot
projects.description: Full-stack AI chatbot with image and recipe generation plus multi-modal chat support. Integrated Spring AI with LLM APIs for intelligent conversation.

projects.title: Spring Boot Testing App
projects.description: Comprehensive testing framework for Spring Boot applications. Demonstrates unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing best practices.
